name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anime Girls on Christmas: Live Wallpaper for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Celebrate the holiday season with this charming live wallpaper featuring anime girls in a festive Christmas setting!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This heartwarming live wallpaper brings the joy of Christmas to your Chrome browser, showcasing adorable anime girls enjoying the holiday spirit. Surrounded by twinkling lights, snowflakes, and cozy decorations, these cheerful characters create the perfect winter wonderland. Every time you open your browser, you'll be greeted with a magical, festive scene that captures the essence of Christmas.

In addition to its beautiful design, this live wallpaper offers practical features. It includes a Google search bar for easy access to your favorite sites, as well as convenient shortcuts to popular websites like YouTube and Facebook. Stay on top of your schedule with the live wallpaper's real-time clock and date display. Download now to bring the holiday cheer and the magic of anime to your browser!
